name: Degree 53
tagline: Improving the Digital Experience for All
description:
We're a leading technology provider, specialising in the development of bespoke gambling and betting platforms, web and mobile solutions, as well as UX, design and consultancy services.
We work with global brands and fast-growing start-ups in online gambling, affiliates, sports, financial services, retail, travel, utilities and education to deliver premium digital products.

locations.address: 72-76 Cross Street, 4th & 5th Floor Steam Packet House
